column5: Hi, I'm a newbie thinking of hitting the lower niagara on the weekend.  How's the water clarity been, any ice chunks/slush/debris to be of concern, and will there be alot of people down there i assume?

There won't be any ice but the water clarity might be bad,,,,was 4ft yesterday ,,but with this wind it won't stay that way,,,,,,are fishing from a boat or shore?    If conditions are good there will be a crowd
